item.title: Simple SAML SSO server for Google Cloud and Apps
item.description: Sample app for SSO between google apps domains. This demonstrates SAML SSO with google properties and is is intended for testing/POC only. The script basically runs a SAML IDP within a docker container and will allow you to login to google apps/gsuites to test out your configuration. You can find the source here: Configure Google Apps SAML/SSO Login to your google apps admin console (admin.
